channel.title: [pi] Blowpipe Charging etc
channel.description:
I've got the other stuff sorted out with the blowpipe except im not sure how to make it so i can charge it correctly at all & how to make it a range weapon without saying i need arrows?
I've got all the models. Uncharged,charged & Zulrah's scales!
